title: Best of Comedy Gold Minds: EarthQuake
description:
We’re celebrating comedic legend and host of ‘Quake’s House’ on SiriusXM’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, EarthQuake, after the release of his new Netflix special, Chappelle’s Home Team: EarthQuake: Legendary. Kevin and Quake talk about the origins of his name, what it’s like being a comedian’s comedian, and when Kevin and Quake went through divorces at the same time.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, EarthQuake)
